name: BEETHOVEN'S REVENGE (48K and 128K Version)
description:
Game made 2022

Having conquered the musical world nearly 200 years prior, fate has given you a second chance!
Mysteriously brought to life, you find yourself imprisoned, alongside other great composers of the past, in a musical detention camp of the future. Spiritual darkness threatens to beat down the souls of aspiring talents here, under the regime of an Elvis wanna be. Who is this audacious "Mike the Guitar", erecting barriers before the musical genius of such masters, declaring "Thus far and no farther"?
Break out of prison and collect the necessary instruments to rescue your fellow composers. Perhaps then, you can "seize fate by the throat", and maybe even the one who captured you...

Ta Ta Ta Taaa!!!!

This latest addition to the "Mike the Guitar" series is an exclusive ZX Spectrum production.

Featuring:
- Beautiful Graphics by ZX Artist Lobo
- Kempston Joystick or Redefinable Keys
- Smooth Sprite movement &Colourful map design
- 48k version with awesome music by Tufty
- extended 128k  version with moore rooms and music by master musicians Yerzmyey & Pedro Pimenta

Many thanks to
- Jonathan Cauldwell for the awesome AGD
- Allan Turvey  for the  brilliant additional AGDx code
- David Saphier for the cracking Musicizer
- Damien Guard for the wonderful Font

P.S. The fancy intro with instructions has still to be done.  It will be a separate file and we will update it as soon as possible!
